taxonomy_a_categories: Fan and Light Combination Dimmer Controls

Smart Wi-Fi Enabled Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for direct wireless control and smart home integration without requiring separate hubs, e.g. wireless dimmers with app control, voice assistant compatible dimmers, WiFi-enabled smart home dimmers

Smart Hub-Dependent Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches requiring a separate hub or bridge for smart functionality and wireless communication, e.g. hub-dependent smart dimmers, proprietary wireless protocol dimmers

Toggle Style Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches featuring traditional toggle or flip-style controls for on/off and brightness adjustment, e.g. toggle dimmers, flip-style dimmers, toggle switches with integrated dimming

Touch Activated Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches operated by touch interface without physical sliding or rotating controls, e.g. touch-sensitive dimmers, capacitive touch light controls, tap-activated dimmers

Digital Display Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches featuring digital displays or LED indicators for precise control feedback, e.g. LCD display dimmers, digital readout light controls

Rotary Knob Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches controlled by rotating knob or dial mechanism for brightness adjustment, e.g. twist-control dimmers, rotary dial light switches, knob-style dimmers

Slide Control Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with sliding control mechanism for linear brightness adjustment, e.g. slider dimmers, linear slide controls, slide-style light dimmers

Fan and Light Combination Dimmer Control.definition: Dimmer switches designed to control both ceiling fans and lights with separate controls, e.g. dual-function fan-light dimmers, combination fan speed and light brightness controls

Commercial 0-10V Dimmer Switches.definition: Specialized dimmer switches using 0-10V control signals for commercial LED drivers, fluorescent ballasts, and low voltage lighting systems, e.g. 0-10V protocol dimmers, commercial LED panel dimmers, ELV dimmers

Smart Dimmer Remote Accessories.definition: Companion devices and mounting accessories for smart dimmer switch systems, e.g. wireless remotes, wall mounting kits, companion switches

Rocker Style Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with rocker-style paddle controls for light adjustment, e.g. rocker dimmers, paddle dimmers, rocker slide dimmers with preset controls

Basic Standard Dimmer Switches.definition: Basic dimmer switches without specialized control mechanisms or smart features, e.g. conventional dimmers, basic light dimmers

Plug-In Portable Dimmer Controls.definition: Portable dimmer controls that plug into outlets for table lamps and portable lighting, e.g. lamp dimmers, plug-in light controls

Motion Sensor Integrated Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with integrated motion detection for automatic lighting control, e.g. occupancy sensor dimmers, motion-activated dimmers

Multi-Location Companion Dimmer Switches.definition: Secondary dimmer switches designed to work with primary dimmers in multi-location setups, e.g. remote dimmers, auxiliary dimmers

Dual Circuit Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches that control two separate lighting circuits from a single device, e.g. dual dimmers, two-circuit dimmers

LED Compatible Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches specifically designed for dimmable LED bulbs and fixtures with optimized compatibility, e.g. LED-compatible dimmers, LED+ dimmer switches

Electronic Low Voltage Dimmer Switches.definition: Specialized dimmer switches designed for electronic low voltage lighting systems and transformers, e.g. ELV dimmers, low voltage compatible dimmers

Handheld Remote Control Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches that include dedicated wireless remote controls for operation, e.g. magnetic remote dimmers, handheld remote dimmers

USB Powered Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches designed for USB-powered LED strips and low voltage lighting applications, e.g. USB inline dimmers, LED strip controllers

Smart Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with wireless connectivity and smart home integration capabilities, e.g. WiFi enabled dimmers, Zigbee dimmers, Matter compatible dimmers

LED Compatible Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches specifically designed for dimmable LED bulbs and fixtures, e.g. LED optimized dimmers, LED plus dimmers

Low Voltage Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches designed for low voltage lighting systems and electronic transformers, e.g. electronic low voltage dimmers, transformer compatible dimmers

Incandescent Dimmer Switches.definition: Traditional dimmer switches designed primarily for incandescent and halogen bulbs, e.g. resistive load dimmers, standard incandescent dimmers

Multi Function Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches with additional features beyond basic dimming control, e.g. dual dimmer switches, dimmer timer combinations

Universal Dimmer Switches.definition: Dimmer switches compatible with multiple bulb types including LED, CFL, incandescent and halogen, e.g. multi-load dimmers, universal compatibility dimmers

Accessory Dimmer Switches.definition: Companion switches and accessories designed to work with main dimmer switches in multi-location setups, e.g. companion switches, remote switches
